Posts.Content: One thing we were told with private medicine....do not use it if you have cancer or heart problems.   You are much better off with th e nhs.    Never understood the ward sister comments but do now. My husband has been looked after much better on nhs than ones on private wards.  Sure you don't get your own room but the advantages outweigh that
Posts.Title: My experience so far
